title: Citibank-Prudential Vietnam Assurance Partnership to Offer Greater Convenience to Customers
summary: Hanoi, Vietnam - Citibank Vietnam announced today its partnership with Prudential Vietnam Assurance to offer an integrated insurance-banking package for greater customer convenience.
tag-1: Citibank-Prudential Vietnam Assurance Partnership to Offer Greater Convenience to Customers
tag-2: Hanoi, Vietnam – Citibank Vietnam announced today its partnership with Prudential Vietnam Assurance to offer an integrated insurance-banking package for greater customer convenience.
tag-3: Jack Howell, Chief Executive Officer of Prudential Vietnam Assurance; Jonathan Larsen, Citi Regional Head of Consumer Banking, Asia Pacific; Chris Crowe, Citi Insurance Regional Head, Asia Pacific and Brett Krause, Citi Country Officer, Citibank Vietnam, together with senior management from Citi and Prudential attended the launch ceremony.
tag-4: The Prudential insurance package will be available at all Citi branches in Ho Chi Minh and Hanoi from November 1, 2011. The four life insurance packages offered through this partnership are Pru Triple Educare (Phu An Gia Thanh Tai), Enhanced Pru Save (Phu An Khang Huu Tri), Pru Smart Saver (Phu Hung Thinh) and Universal Life Product (Phu Toan Gia An Phuc). Complementing these main products are various supplementary health insurance products. With these packages, Citibank's customers will have a comprehensive choice of health, savings, retirement and investment solutions for their financial protection.
tag-5: Jonathan Larsen said, "I am confident that this partnership between Citi and Prudential will benefit both companies and our Vietnamese customers. We look forward to a successful partnership and opportunities for further cooperation between the two companies in the future."
tag-6: "We are delighted to announce the partnership between Prudential Vietnam and Citi," said Jack Howell. "As leading businesses in our own respective sectors, we are combining our strengths to deliver a comprehensive financial package for Vietnamese customers."
tag-7: The integrated insurance-banking package offers customers diversified options to access both banking and insurance services at one transaction point. Citi started bancassurance more than 10 years ago, and the distribution of insurance products has contributed significantly to Citi in Asia Pacific.
tag-8: Prudential has become an important partner to Citibank, covering various geographic and product lines that range from general insurance products to life insurance products; serving the needs of Citibank customers. This partnership reinforces Prudential's consistent strategy in diversifying its distribution channels as well as in making its products more accessible. Prudential products are currently distributed through various channels, including agencies, telemarketing, retail assurance and bancassurance.
tag-9: Prudential Vietnam (www.prudential.com.vn) Prudential Vietnam is a leading financial service group which operates in the fields of insurance, investment and retail finance in Vietnam.
tag-10: Being one of the leading life insurers, Prudential Vietnam Assurance is honored to provide financial protection to millions of Vietnamese people via an extensive network of 216 customer service centers, branch offices and general agency offices in all 63 provinces in Vietnam. Prudential Vietnam has consistently maintained the lead in the life market with about 38% market share in terms of premium income (as of June 2011).
tag-11: In addition to its market leadership in the life insurance sector, Prudential is also a key player in the investment market. Prudential Vietnam Fund Management Company (PVFMC), established in 2005, is a leading fund manager with the largest investor base in Vietnam. PVFMC's highly professional and experienced investment team currently serves more than 8,000 clients with over US$1.2 billion funds under management (as of December 2010).
tag-12: With the establishment of Prudential Vietnam Finance Company in 2007, Prudential has also provided retail finance services to many Vietnamese. The company recently celebrated its 100,000th customer after 3 years of operations.
tag-13: Besides business activities, Prudential Vietnam has been very active in social, community programs with a strong focus in education, technology, sports and charity. The company considers these a great way of giving back to the community that has supported its success over the past 11 years in Vietnam.
tag-14: Always remaining true to its credo to "Always Listening, Always Understanding", Prudential Vietnam has developed an exceptional strong foundation in Vietnam and is well-positioned to continue to grow strongly, contributing to the development of the financial market, the economy, as well as the well-being of the Vietnamese people.
tag-15: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-16: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://new.citi.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-17: Citi Vietnam (www.citibank.com.vn ) Citi is the leading foreign bank in Vietnam with branches in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City. With more than 350 employees, Citi operates the largest Vietnamese alliance bank network of more than 5,100 nationwide online transaction points covering the entire country.
tag-18: Citi offers a wide range of banking services including retail banking, corporate banking, investment banking and transaction services to more than 780 local corporates, multinationals, financial institutions and SME clients, serving more than 2,000 accounts.
tag-19: Citi combines its global presence and resources along with its local footprint to offer innovative solutions to meet the evolving needs of our clients both in Vietnam and those looking to invest in Vietnam.
tag-20: Citi has made a long-term commitment to Vietnam and has played a major role in assisting in the development of Vietnam's financial markets. Citi was the first US financial institution to receive a branch license in 1993 and the first US bank to open a branch in Hanoi in 1994.
